issue_obverse_figure_s: Right profile of Peroz on frontal bust
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: crown with two mural elements, pearl, to the left and right a wing; crescent above covered korymbos, pearl diadem, diadem ribbons horizontally ribbed commencing to the left and right behind the shoulders, vertically ribbed, pointing upwards; earing consisting of three elements; neck-line of tunica edged with a row of pearls; double row of pearls running from the shoulders to the breast ornament (only upper part visible); dotted border
issue_obverse_legend_s: 11 h l. o.mzdysn bgy- kdy pylwcy | mazdēsn bay Pērōz |"The Mazda-worshiping divine king Peroz"
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: base consisting of two elements; round altar shaft; to the left and right of the shaft ribbons pointing downwards, three altar slabs; alter flames, rendered as four tiers of four, three, two and one strokes respectively; star to left of altar flames, crescent to the right, to the left and the right of altar attendant with stylized crown of Peroz, right hand raised, both figures facing inwards; pylwcy at 9 h; dotted border
